summary: Verified DD-MM-YYYY date format implementation across UI forms and PDF generation. All date pickers display dates correctly in DD-MM-YYYY format while maintaining YYYY-MM-DD for backend storage.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Date format change from YYYY-MM-DD to DD-MM-YYYY has been successfully implemented. DatePicker component uses Shadcn Calendar and displays DD-MM-YYYY to users while storing YYYY-MM-DD in backend. PDF generation uses format_date_ddmmyyyy() function to convert dates.

ir_thermography_form.date_picker_calendar_popup: PASS - Calendar popup appears correctly when clicking date picker
ir_thermography_form.date_format_display: PASS - Selected date displays as DD-MM-YYYY (e.g., 15-01-2026)

amc_form.date_picker_calendar_popup: PASS - Calendar popup works for contract dates
amc_form.date_format_display: PASS - Selected date displays as DD-MM-YYYY (e.g., 20-01-2026)

transformer_form.date_picker_calendar_popup: PASS - Calendar popup works for report dates
transformer_form.date_format_display: PASS - Selected date displays as DD-MM-YYYY (e.g., 20-01-2026)

pdf_generation.ir_thermography_pdf: PASS - PDF shows dates in DD-MM-YYYY format (verified: DATE: 20-01-2026)
